schema.title: Response Logout V1 Auth Logout Post

get.description: Get the current authenticated user's profile.
Get all photos for the current user.

schema.title: Response List Photos V1 Profile Photos Get

post.description: Add a new photo to the user's profile.

delete.description: Delete a photo from the user's profile.

put.description: Reorder photos by providing photo IDs in desired order.

schema.title: Response Reorder User Photos V1 Profile Photos Reorder Put

get.description: Get list of available prompt questions.
Get all prompts for the current user.

schema.title: Response List Prompts V1 Profile Prompts Get

post.description: Add a new prompt answer to the user's profile.

delete.description: Delete a prompt from the user's profile.

post.description: Submit quiz answers and receive generated badges.

schema.title: Response Submit Quiz Answers V1 Profile Quiz Post

get.description: Get the current user's quiz responses.

schema.title: Response Get Quiz Responses V1 Profile Quiz Get

get.description: Get all badges for the current user.

schema.title: Response List Badges V1 Profile Badges Get

get.description: Get profile completion status and percentage.

Get discovery feed with up to 10 curated profiles.

Returns profiles ranked by compatibility, completeness, and activity.
Handles scarcity gracefully with suggestions if pool is limited.

post.description:
Send a like to another user.

- Limited to 10 likes per day
- First 5 likes require a comment
- Rate limited to prevent spam
- Creates a match if mutual

get.description: Get likes received that you haven't acted on yet.

schema.title: Response Get Likes Received V1 Matching Likes Pending Get

post.description:
Pass on a profile.

- Not permanent: expires after 30 days
- User will see this profile again after cooldown

delete.description:
Undo a pass (limited usage).

Use this if you accidentally passed on someone.

schema.title: Response List Matches V1 Matching Matches Get

post.description:
Block a user.

- They will never appear in your feed again
- You will never appear in their feed
- Any active match will be ended

Report a user for review.

- User will be automatically blocked
- Report will be reviewed by moderators

get.description: Get compatibility details with another user.

Get current daily discovery state and profile to view.

Returns:
- Today's discovery state (profiles, progress, free pick status)
- Current profile to view (if not complete)
- Active view info if already viewing a profile

post.description:
Start viewing a profile. Records server-side timestamp.

Call this when displaying a profile to the user.
The server records the exact start time for validation.

End viewing a profile with an action (interest or pass).

Server validates:
- View exists and belongs to user
- For 'interest' with free_pick already used: minimum view time met
- Server calculates actual duration (not client-provided)

Free pick rules:
- First interest of the day is always allowed (becomes 'free_pick')
- Subsequent interests require MINIMUM_VIEW_SECONDS seconds of viewing

Express interest in a profile (convenience endpoint).

Ends the view with 'interest' action and returns next profile.

Pass on a profile (convenience endpoint).

Ends the view with 'pass' action and returns next profile.
Pass does not require minimum view time.

Reset daily discovery state for testing.

Only available in development mode.

DailyDiscoveryProfileOut.title: DailyDiscoveryProfileOut
DailyDiscoveryProfileOut.description: Profile for daily discovery - age calculated server-side, no PII.

DailyDiscoveryStateOut.title: DailyDiscoveryStateOut
DailyDiscoveryStateOut.description: Current state of user's daily discovery.

ExpressInterestRequest.title: ExpressInterestRequest
ExpressInterestRequest.description: Request to express interest in a profile.

PassProfileRequest.title: PassProfileRequest
PassProfileRequest.description: Request to pass on a profile.

PassProfileResponse.title: PassProfileResponse
PassProfileResponse.description: Response when passing on a profile.

ViewEndRequest.title: ViewEndRequest
ViewEndRequest.description: Request to end viewing (interest or pass).

ViewStartRequest.title: ViewStartRequest
ViewStartRequest.description: Request to start viewing a profile.

is_free_pick.title: Is Free Pick
is_free_pick.description: Whether this is the user's free pick (no wait required)

ViewStartResponse.title: ViewStartResponse
ViewStartResponse.description: Response when starting to view a profile.
